body:
Immediately move to impeach Biden for his foreign ties and election fraud. It's only fair. Besides, Harris is gonna be president anyway lol. We will not win, but we owe Biden at least as much hell as the Dems have given Trump.

Seriously though. If the legitimate accusations don't work, just start making shit up. It doesn't even have to be true, just swivel from wild accusation to wild accusation. Facts don't matter. We've learned from the left that tantrums DO, in fact, get you what you want.

Let's make them live under the rules they've set and expose this clown show for what it is. Let's hear them explain why this isn't okay now.
